entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4 except minus 11 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
